abstract: New Jersey’s attorney general has begun investigating whether the biotechnology giant violated patient confidentiality laws in its effort to sell its drug Enbrel.
snippet: New Jersey’s attorney general has begun investigating whether the biotechnology giant violated patient confidentiality laws in its effort to sell its drug Enbrel.
lead_paragraph: New Jersey’s attorney general has begun investigating whether the biotechnology giant Amgen violated patient confidentiality laws in its effort to sell its drug Enbrel.

headline.main: New Jersey Investigating Amgen’s Marketing of a Psoriasis Drug
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Investigating Amgen’s Marketing of a Psoriasis Drug
